name: Lemon Drop Pepper
description: The Lemon Drop pepper is a Capsicum baccatum cultivar that produces high yields of 60mm long, cone-shaped, slightly crinkled peppers that are yellow when ripe. Peppers have a spicy, citrus-like, lemon flavor and a Scoville rating of 15,000-30,000 units. They are popular in Peruvian cuisine.
sowing_method: Direct seed indoors, transplant seedlings outside after hardening off
